items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Soft & Comfortable
items.body: I love this sweater! The material is super soft and so comfortable to wear. It has a relaxed fit that looks great off the shoulder. Definitely one of my new favorites. Read more
items.author: Jennifer S

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cozy sweater, not really off the shoulder
items.body: I picked this up expecting more of an off-the-shoulder sweater based on the listing, but in reality it’s more of a boat neck style. You can kind of pull it off the shoulder if you size up, but true to size it definitely sits more like a wide neckline. That wasn’t a dealbreaker for me, just something to be aware of. The sweater itself is very cozy and soft. It’s not super thick, but it’s warm enough for cooler weather and feels comfortable without being heavy. The fit is relaxed and slightly slouchy in a good way, and the sleeves are one of my favorite parts. They’re a little longer and look really nice cuffed. The color matched the listing well, and overall it looks cute and put together for casual wear or even work depending on how you style it. For $20 at the time of review, the quality feels reasonable and the value is there. Overall, it’s a comfortable and flattering sweater as long as you don’t go in expecting a true off-the-shoulder look. Read more
items.author: Ky

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Closet staple
items.body: Love! So comfortable…will be purchasing more colors! Read more
items.author: Mandos

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Don't recommend
items.body: Looks nothing like the picture the neck is super small doesn't hang off the shoulder the sleeves are really small that you can barely get your hand through it do not recommend Read more
items.author: Trish A.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not off the shoulder, and not as luxurious as the picture implies
items.body: Based on the picture in the listing, I was expecting a thick, luxurious, soft-yet-chunky, off-the-shoulder sweater that would make me feel like a Hamptons girlie at a winter soiree. Alas, the reality was not quite there. Things to note: 1. It is definitely not off-the-shoulder. I'd describe this as not-quite boat neck. There is really no way to pull it off the shoulder without it looking like you took a regular sweater and yanked open the neck, lol. In fact, the neck is *just* wide enough to make it awkward to wear a regular bra, which is the worst of both worlds. 2. It is significantly thinner than expected, and actually see-through in parts. You can't really wear a shirt underneath since (as established) the neckline is weird, so the see-through factor is a problem for me. 3. The fabric is strange; it's soft, but not luxuriously so, and the look is not what I was hoping for; it almost looks like the whole thing was intentionally pre-pilled? I guess that means that if it pills more, you won't be able to tell, but I'd rather have it NOT be pilled. Maybe you like that sort of rugged look to the fabric and you'll love this! 4. The khaki color is darker than depicted in the photo; I actually don't mind the real color, but you should know that if you were hoping for the lighter color that's shown. 5. Obviously this isn't a super expensive sweater, so I managed my expectations accordingly, but I know you work hard for your money so I want to make sure you're making an informed choice! For me, the value for the money isn't quite there, but perhaps the factors above will be pluses for you, in which case, that's great! Read more
items.author: Grammar Snob

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sweater weather here I come!
items.body: This sweater is really cute and it’s very soft. The cozy oversized fit and long sleeves are perfect for sweater weather. Size is accurate. My only concern is the material...I noticed a small snag right out of the bag, and I can see more happening over time, so it might not hold up perfectly long-term. Overall great value. Read more
items.author: Domi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute
items.body: Perfect cute sweater that u can stretch a bit for a off shoulder look and so comfy it isn’t itchy at all! (it is slightly see through and very delicate) Read more
items.author: Shani Ben Ami

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft. So cozy.
items.body: I’m 5 months pregnant, 6 ft tall, and wear a 36 DDD bust. I love oversized sweaters SOOOOO much and this one checks every box. It’s soft, lightweight, and the neckline is absolutely perfect. It may look warm, but it’s actually breathable, and depending on what you wear underneath you can see through it a bit. The sleeves are cuffed, the pattern is gorgeous, and the fit is just right. I love everything about it. The price is amazing and the sweater is so versatile you can dress it up or down. Truly perfect! Read more
items.author: Hope & Luis

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress One Shoulder Boat Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress One Shoulder Boat Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, Pink, White, Beige, Yellow, Army Green, Black, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
